definitions.definition: a number of shares that somebody has in a company

examples.text: She has a 40% holding in the company.

definitions.definition: an amount of property that is owned by a person, museum, library, etc.

examples.text: one of the most important private holdings of Indian art
The holding has been housed in the museum since 2002.

definitions.definition: a piece of land that is rented by somebody and used for farming
